titles: The reform'd wife a comedy, as it is acted at the Theatre-Royal in Drury Lane.
author: Burnaby, William, 1672 or 3-1706.
notes: Formerly ascribed to Charles Burnaby; for discussion of authorship cf. William Burnaby, Dramatic works, edited by F.E. Budd, 1931.
Reproduction of original in Huntinton Library.
